definition: to be rich in (some quality or other)
rich/abundant/exuberant/to add for free/to throw in as bonus/to spare/to forgive/despite/although

sentences.english: She is intelligent in business with creative mind.
sentences.chinese: 甚具商業頭腦，饒富創意有才華。

sentences.english: We thrive on negative criticism , which is fun to write and to read.
sentences.chinese: 我們以負面評論見稱，因爲讀寫皆饒富趣味。
美國有段饒富趣味的歷史。
